text: Aglais rizana, the mountain tortoiseshell, is a species of nymphalid butterfly found in Asia. ==Distribution== Pamirs to Alay Range, Afghanistan, northwest Himalayas. ==Description== Aglais rizana Frederic Moore (1872) gives a detailed description for Vanessa rizana: ==References== Category:Fauna of Afghanistan Category:Nymphalini Category:Butterflies described in 1872 Category:Taxa named by Frederic Moore Category:Butterflies of Asia
title: Aglais rizana
